All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthBadResponse
The AuthBadResponse class represents a negative http authentication response.
AuthGoodResponse
The AuthGoodResponse class represents a positive http authentication response.
AuthRequest
The AuthRequest class represents a http authentication request.
AuthRestController
The AuthRestController class handles user login requests.
AuthUser
The AuthUser class is the authentication equivalent of the User domain model class.
AuthUserDetailService
The AuthUserDetailService class implements the UserDetailsService interface.
BaseDTO
The BaseDTO class enables subtype polymorphism for DTO implementations.
BaseResponse
The BaseResponse abstract class enables subtype polymorphism for the AuthResponses.
DocumentAlreadyExistsException
Custom exception class indicating that a document with a given ID already exists.
DocumentNotFoundException
Custom exception class indicating that a document with a given ID or username does not exist.
IReviewService
The IReviewService interface contains the service-layer definitions of the CRUD methods used for managing Review documents.
IUserService
The IUserService interface contains the service-layer definitions of the CRUD methods used for managing User documents.
JwtControlFilter
The JwtControlFilter class is a jwt-specific implementation of the OncePerRequestFilter abstract class.
JwtService
The JwtService class provides jwt-specific services used during the authentication process.
MongoAudit
The MongoAudit class enables the activation of the @CreatedDate and @LastModifiedDate annotations used in domain model classes.
Review
The Review class represents a review posted by a User.
ReviewApplication
Backend implementation of a review app.
ReviewCrudExceptionDTO
The ReviewCrudExceptionDTO class is a special DTO class for communicating exceptions to the frontend.
ReviewInsertDTO
The ReviewInsertDTO class is the DTO equivalent of the Review domain model class, adjusted for insertion operations.
ReviewInsertValidator
The ReviewInsertValidator class performs input validation on ReviewInsertDTO objects.
ReviewMapper
The ReviewMapper class is a utility class that maps DTOs to the Review domain model class and vice versa.
ReviewReadOnlyDTO
The ReviewReadOnlyDTO class is the DTO equivalent of the Review domain model class, adjusted for read-only operations.
ReviewRepo
Repository interface for managing Reviews.
ReviewRestController
The ReviewRestController class handles the CRUD requests for Reviews.
ReviewServiceImpl
The ReviewServiceImpl class implements the CRUD wrapper methods as defined in the IReviewService interface.
ReviewUpdateDTO
The ReviewUpdateDTO class is the DTO equivalent of the Review domain model class, adjusted for updating operations.
ReviewUpdateValidator
The ReviewUpdateValidator class performs input validation on ReviewUpdateDTO objects.
Role
The Role enum class contains the standardized options of the Role field in the User class.
User
The User class represents an application User.
UserInsertDTO
The UserInsertDTO class is the DTO equivalent of the User domain model class, adjusted for insertion operations.
UserInsertValidator
The UserInsertValidator class performs input validation on UserInsertDTO objects.
UserManagementConfig
The UserManagementConfig class contains user authentication configurations.
UserMapper
The UserMapper class is a utility class that maps DTOs to the User domain model class and vice versa.
UserReadOnlyDTO
The UserReadOnlyDTO class is the DTO equivalent of the User domain model class, adjusted for read-only operations.
UserRegDTO
The UserRegDTO class is a special DTO class for communicating the result of the registration process to the frontend.
UserRepo
Repository interface for managing Users.
UserRestController
The UserRestController class handles the requests for registration of new users.
UserServiceImpl
The UserServiceImpl class implements the CRUD wrapper methods as defined in the IUserService interface.
UserUpdateDTO
The UserUpdateDTO class is the DTO equivalent of the User domain model class, adjusted for updating operations.
WebSecurityConfig
The WebSecurityConfig class contains the Security Filter Chain configurations.
